title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil:Three Years Of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil: Karan Johar’s Golden Tribute To One-Sided Lovers Still Has Our Heart
text:
"Ek tarfa Pyar ki taaqat hi kuch aur hoti hai. Auro ke rishto ki tarah yeh do logon mein nahin bat ti sirf mera haq hai ispe.”

Have you ever experienced one-sided love? Have you ever gone through a feeling where in you felt that despite giving your all, sometimes it's still not enough. Three years ago, Karan Johar made a movie, which he says is close to his heart, on unrequited love and all one-sided lovers felt the pain that Ranbir’s character went through in the movie.

Twitter

“Adhoora hoke bhi hai ishq mera kaamil.” – The dialogues from the movie and the melodious songs had such deep meaning that even those who hadn’t experienced the love which is not reciprocated felt the pain.

Twitter

“Mujh se pehli si mohabbat mere mehboob na maang, aur bhi dukh hai zamaane mein mohabbat ke siwaa.”

Each dialogue strikes a chord with your heart!

pinimg.com

Remember the song Channa Mereya? The soulful song connected with so many people that it made a lot of waves. It did tug at our heartstrings.

Twitter

Ae Dil Hai Mushkil might not be the best kind of cinema. It also might not be Karan Johar’s best film. Despite that, it is a film that will remain etched in people’s hearts and will be remembered for a long time.

pinimg.com

“Pyaar mein junoon hai, par dosti mein sukoon hai.” If one line could explain the difference between two most adorable bonds we have with people – friendship and love – then this would be it.

Twitter

With melodious music, iconic dialogues, beautifully relatable characters and a heart-touching story, Karan Johar’s Ae Dil Hai Mushkil still has our heart.

pinimg.com

As the film completes three years of its release, Karan Johar got nostalgic too.

“A film closest to my heart....had the best time filming it and have indelible memories! Thank you to the entire cast and crew that made this experience so memorable. ...it’s about the liberation of a broken heart,” he shared on social media.

pinimg.com

Karan Johar had once said that Ae Dil Hai Mushkil is “an ode to myself without being self-indulgent. It is about the angst of falling in love without reciprocation. I am the brand ambassador of that emotion. Every tear that you shed ( When you watch the film) is a dollar in my account. You weep and I laugh all the way to the bank."

Twitter

"Accha chalta hoon... Duaaon mein yaad rakhna... Mere zikr ka zubaan pe swaad rakhna"

Is Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, Karan Johar's best work so far? Fun Fact: He wrote the script in just 30 days.
